=== Summary ===

Provide an infrastructure to watch recoreded tutorials. This includes a set of basic tutorials that is shipped by default. Allow the community to provide custom tutorials and advert them on a central web site, e.g. "how to remove red eyes with GIMP".

=== Design ===

Use Istanbul to record videos in ogg/theora. Use the [SubtitleEditor http://kitone.free.fr/subtitleeditor/] to create subtitles to save disk space and provide translated tutorials.
